resources.string: Do you want to host with every users in this class?
Would you like to share your webcam?
Webcams are limited to the first 6 users.
A user would like to share their webcam with the class!
Would you like to display video from %1$s?
A new user would like to join the class!
Would you like to add %1$s to the class?
Would you like to rejoin the main webcam channel?
Would you like to start a new webcam channel for your board?
A standard class which uses both the whiteboard and webcams.
This mode uses the whiteboard only. Webcams are turned off but you can still communicate by voice if you wish.
Only selected user webcams will be streamed in the class.
This class can only be progressed by teacher.
You are able to obtain class control
Would you like to let this user host the class?
Do you want to take over class control?
Note your ideas on your board while listening to teacher\'s lessons.\nYou can also do group activity with friends!
Is it a fun and useful class?\nCopy your class code and learn together with your friends!
Participation request is received\nWould you like to remove the limit?
Would you like to remove the limit?
Press the submit button to send your answer.
Take turn to write and question each other!\nYour class will be more fun!
Do you want to delete this comment?
Are you sure you want to delete\nall drawing, shapes and text?
Enter the title you want to change.
Do you want to leave or close the class?\nIf you close the class, it will be deleted.
Do you want to leave the class?
Do you want to delete this image?
Do you want to delete this memo?
No requests to join this class.
Do you want to delete this pdf file?
Adding more than three pages requires 50 stars.\nAre you sure you want to add more pages?
Are you sure you want to kick this user? (%1$s)
Copy the class address to clipboard and share!
This option can only be selected once, and students will not be able to view webcams or hear audio.
This option can only be selected once, and students will not be able to view shared videos.
Visit facebook.com/device and enter the code shown above.
Unexpected error while downloading an image.
To connect your account, open the Facebook app on your mobile device and check for notifications.
You\'re in control - choose what info you want to share with apps.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

Are you sure to sign out?
Special characters cannot be used in names.
There was an error signing in. Please contact us at help@klounges.com.
Initializing payment. Please try again in a few minutes.
Are you not a member yet?
You can create up to 100 classes.
Sorry, this class is full. Please try again later.
You can invite up to 30 people.

Limit for maximum participation is
3 people now.

or remove the limit directly.
This is a private class.\nPlease enter the password.
You don\'t have enough stars.\nWould you like to move to the Starshop?
Are you sure you want to abort this question?
One class can have up to 3 users for free.\nWould you like to use 50 stars to remove this limit?\n(Up to 30 users can participate at once)
Watch new feeds from Facebook page
Join classes with a code or apply to participate
View more on our YouTube channel

Let\'s study at Knowlounge with your friends!
The class can\'t be found or has been deleted.
Try it freely on the various environments such as tablet and desktop!
Try the smart classroom with face-to-face!
You can share various classroom materials without papers.
Public classes from your Google/Facebook friends appear here.
Are you sure to delete this class?
Use the whiteboard for easy teaching!
Add YouTube videos to your class.
Use the whiteboard to ask questions.
You can see public classes of your school teachers here.
Add a school to your profile and connect with teachers and friends!
Bookmark classes you use the most here.
Attend various classes and study together!\nYou can easily find previous classes you attended here.
Create a class and invite others to study together!
Unstable network connection.\nPlease check your network connection.
If you want to use Knowlounge, please allow the permissons.
To use Knowlounge, you must to allow the following permissions.\n\n
Press the Finish button to end the question.
Select the type of alternative answer
You can not move the whiteboard while a question is in progress.
You can not move the whiteboard while a question is in progress.

There is already a question in progress.
There is a question in progress. Please try again in a few minutes.
Students can only ask questions from their own board. (My board)
Please select an area for your answer.
Your answer has been submitted sucessfully. Press OK to return to the teacher\'s board.
Failed to load selected question. Please try again.
You can ask to join the class or remove the class limits by using stars.
This class has reached its free limit of 3 users.
You do not have permission to insert files. \nPlease try again after gaining permissions.
By removing the class limits, up to 30 users can join a class with an unlimited number of pages.

Classroom to teach easy with fun!\nLet\'s study at Knowlounge with your friends!\n
